laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to ensure it is reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited under Ohio law. Replace with: "The employee agrees not to engage in any competing activities within a 50-mile radius of the company's headquarters in Ohio for a period of 12 months following termination of employment." Remove this clause entirely for broadcast employees, as non-competes are banned for this group under Ohio law.
